summary: This mod overhauls the Archery-Skill. It adds the Trick Shot perk, fixes the critical damage of Critical Shot, adds two more ranks to the Bullseye-perk, enhances the Steady Hand perks and increases the draw speed increase of Quick Shot.
descriptionHtml:
DEUTSCHE VERSION: (bald)

One-Handed Overhaul ENGLISH: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/51358
Einhändig Overhaul DEUTSCH: (bald)

Two-Handed Overhaul ENGLISH: (soon)
Zweihändig Overhaul DEUTSCH: (bald)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description:


New perk:

Trick Shot *:

Requirements:
- 80 points in Archery
- Quick Shot

Effect:
- 25% chance to disarm an opponent


Changes of existing perks:

Critical Shot (1/3):

Requirements:
- 30 points in Archery
- Overdraw rank 1

Effects:
- 10% chance of dealing critical damage
- 1.5x critical damage

Critical Shot (2/3):

Requirements:
- 60 points in Archery
- Critical Shot rank 1

Effects:
- 20% chance of dealing critical damage
- 2.0x critical damage

Critical Shot (3/3):

Requirements:
- 90 points in Archery
- Critical Shot rank 2

Effects:
- 30% chance of dealing critical damage
- 3.0x critical damage


Bullseye (1/3):

Requirements:
- 100 points in Archery
- Ranger OR Trick Shot

Effect:
- 10% chance of paralyzing the target for 5 seconds

Bullseye (2/3):

Requirements:
- 100 points in Archery
- Bullseye rank 1

Effect:
- 20% chance of paralyzing the target for 10 seconds

Bullseye (3/3):

Requirements:
- 100 points in Archery
- Bullseye rank 2

Effect:
- 35% chance of paralyzing the target for 15 seconds


Steady Hand (1/2):

Requirements:
- 40 points in Archery
- Eagle Eye

Effects:
- Zooming in with a bow slows time by 25%
- Zooming in with a bow costs 50% less stamina

Steady Hand (2/2):

Requirements:
- 60 points in Archery
- Steady Hand rank 1

Effects:
- Zooming in with a bow slows time by 50%
- Zooming in with a bow costs no stamina


Quick Shot:

Requirements:
- 70 points in Archery
- Power Shot

Effect:
- Can draw a bow 50% faster


* This perks already existed, but Bethesda (I don't know why) did not include it in the game.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:

- Skyrim
- WinRAR or 7-Zip


Installation:

- Unpack the file into your Skyrim/Data directory and activate it in your Skyrim-launcher


Used Software:

- Skyrim Creation Kit
author: Aerimes
